backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing access control, user profiles, song management, likes, play counts, favorites, and playlist storage with admin passcode gating.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old official playlists to the new format during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and dark-mode styles defining global color tokens and layout primitives.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, icons, theme colors, start URL, and categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling app shell caching and special logic for audio request caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring providers, navigation, deep links, welcome popup, admin mode, and screen rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassc: Dialog for enabling or disabling admin mode via passcode, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Components that conditionally render or disable content based on admin status, optionally showing tooltips.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppHead: App header displaying the logo and title with styled branding.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeChannel: Admin‑editable banner component allowing file upload, URL input, and clearing of the home channel image.
Main app layout with starfield background, header, navigation, footer, and content container.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Panel listing user and official playlists with dialogs for creating new ones and auth/admin checks.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryT: Tab selector switching between songs and playlists in the library view.
frontend/src/components/library/Playlist: Displays playlist details, fetches songs for user or official playlists, and provides playback controls like play, shuffle, and repeat.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar with tabs and highlights the active screen.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Provides a slide-out sidebar menu with navigation links, install prompt, and login/logout actions.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/First: Shows a welcome modal on first launch with options to continue as guest or sign in.
frontend/src/components/player/MusicPlay: Audio player component that handles playback, progress, volume, and play count updates for the current song.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSBanner.t: Displays a dismissible banner prompting users to install the PWA and hides after dismissal.
frontend/src/components/SignInModal.tsx: Mobile/desktop modal for signing in with Internet Identity, handling login, cancel, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/songs/CreatePlay: Dialog for creating a playlist and adding a song to it, handling auth requirements and error states.
frontend/src/components/songs/DownloadCh: Responsive dialog/drawer offering offline caching or device download options for a song.
frontend/src/components/songs/Horizontal: Compact horizontal song card with artwork, play button, overflow menu, and engagement bar.
Horizontal scrollable row that displays a titled list of song cards.
frontend/src/components/songs/PlaylistCh: Dialog/drawer allowing users to add or remove a song from their playlists with auth handling.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongCard.t: Grid-style song card with artwork, play/delete controls, and an engagement bar overlay.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEditor: Admin-only dialog for creating new songs with file or URL uploads and form validation.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEngage: Displays like and play counts with an optional like button and compact mode.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongListRo: Row-style song item with artwork, play/delete controls, engagement bar, and overflow menu.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongOverfl: Provides a mobile/desktop overflow menu for song actions like favoriting, playlist management, downloads, sharing, and offline caching with auth handling.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongsSortB: Renders a simple select control allowing users to choose how songs are sorted.
frontend/src/components/visual/Starfield: Creates an animated starfield background in dark mode using DOM elements and optional reduced animations.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines feature flags, currently enabling desktop bottom tab bar behavior.
frontend/src/context/AdminContext.tsx: Provides admin-mode state derived from HiddenAdminMode, exposing isAdmin without async loading.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Manages authentication state, sign-in modal, and pending user actions requiring auth.
frontend/src/context/HiddenAdminModeCont: Implements a hidden admin mode unlocked by passcode, stored in sessionStorage, with modal controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Handles Add-to-Home-Screen install prompt events and exposes method to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstLaunchWelcome: Tracks whether the app's first-launch welcome screen should be shown using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBanner.ts: Manages home banner image state with persistence, validation, and fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity integration, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Deprecated hook that always returns non-admin state for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikedSongs.ts: Provides liked-song lookup using user identity and favorites, returning helpers and a Set of song IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks viewport match for a media query and includes a mobile-specific helper.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingAction.ts: Executes deferred user actions after authentication, handling likes, playlists, downloads, and error cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating songs and playlists with admin-mode checks and asset handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Context for user settings with persistence to localStorage and UI updates such as reduced animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongEngagement.ts: Handles liking and playing songs with authentication checks and soft sign‑in fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Theme context storing light/dark mode with persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark design tokens, global styles, and animation reduction behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutArtistScreen.tsx: Displays artist information and external links to social profiles.
frontend/src/pages/ContactScreen.tsx: Contact page offering a description and an email link for inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/CustomSongRequestsScr: Explains custom song request offerings and provides coffee/support and email contact links.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home screen fetching songs, managing playback state, showing new and top songs, and supporting admin deletion.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryScreen.tsx: Library screen handling tabs, playlists, favorites, and playlist-aware music playback with shuffle and repeat.
frontend/src/pages/SearchScreen.tsx: Search interface that queries songs by keyword and provides playback of search results.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings page allowing users to configure audio quality, animations, visual effects, and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/SongsScreen.tsx: Song list screen with sorting options, music playback, deep-link handling, and admin song deletion.
frontend/src/pages/SupportScreen.tsx: Support page encouraging user donations with a link to Buy Me a Coffee.
frontend/src/pages/ThemesScreen.tsx: Theme selection page for switching between dark and light modes.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Parses backend errors to identify admin or sign‑in authorization issues and provides user‑friendly messages and helpers.
frontend/src/utils/dataUrl.ts: Detects data URLs and converts them into byte arrays for blob handling.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Builds, parses, and clears song deep‑link parameters using query or hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Validates audio URLs, generates safe filenames, and triggers browser downloads for songs.
frontend/src/utils/offlineAudioCache.ts: Caches, checks, removes, and clears audio files using the browser Cache API for offline playback.
frontend/src/utils/playlistPlayback.ts: Provides shuffle, next/previous index logic with repeat support, and song lookup by ID.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Supports sharing via Web Share API or clipboard with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/songSort.ts: Implements deterministic sorting of songs by newest, top liked, or most heard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Retrieves, stores, persists, and clears URL parameters across query and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for the MVRIO Night PWA, including UI rules, authentication and guest mode behavior, admin-mode design, and known issues. Contains architectural notes and versioning metadata for planning and builds.
